sQuestion: Dan had 7 potatoes and 4 cantelopes in the garden . The rabbits ate 4 of the potatoes . Mia hired 6 new employees. How many potatoes does Dan now have ?

James answered 10 questions correctly. In Yardley it snowed 0.125 inch in the morning and 0.5 inch in the afternoon . What was the total amount of snowfall ?

Alexander visited 3 different countries. Sam had 49 pennies and 24 nickels in his bank . His dad gave him 39 nickels and 31 quarters . How many nickels does he have now ?

Janet 's sandcastle was 3.6666666666666665 feet tall and her sister 's was 2.3333333333333335 feet tall . How much taller was Janet 's sandcastle than her sister 's ?

Then she walked 0.1111111111111111 mile from the postcard shop to a T-shirt shop and 0.6666666666666666 mile from the T-shirt shop back to the hotel . How many miles did Trisha walk in all ?

How many cartons of ice cream did Allie have in all ?
